Button.description: Base button component with full variant support

Input.description: Text input component with validation and theme integration

Card.description: Content container with shadow and border options

examples: This is the main content of the card.

ErrorBoundary.description: Error boundary component for error handling

fallback.description: Fallback UI to render on error

ButtonPrimary.description: Primary action button with enhanced styling

ButtonGhost.description: Subtle secondary button with transparent background

ButtonDanger.description: Destructive action button for delete/cancel operations

ButtonSuccess.migrationNotes: Consider migrating to Button with variant='default' for better consistency

InputGroup.description: Input group component for combined inputs

FormField.description: Form field wrapper with label, input, and error message
examples: <FormField name='email' label='Email Address' required error={errors.email}><FormInput type='email' placeholder='Enter your email' /></FormField>
<AlertDescription>This is additional information about the alert.</AlertDescription>

Badge.description: Badge component for labels and tags

HoverCard.description: Hover card component with trigger and content

Popover.description: Popover component with trigger and content

examples: <SearchBarNew placeholder='Search with filters...' showFilters onSearch={(query, filters) => handleSearch(query, filters)} />
<DialogDescription>Are you sure you want to delete this item?</DialogDescription>

TamylaThemeProvider.description: Theme context provider with Redux integration

metadata.description: React component library with Factory Bridge pattern

primaryActions.description: Primary user actions like save, submit, create

secondaryActions.description: Secondary actions like cancel, back, skip

destructiveActions.description: Dangerous actions like delete, remove, cancel

solutions.description: Ensure theme provider is at app root
